item.title: Session 01
item.description: Reference WATER MEASUREMENT MANUAL: A guide to effective water measurement practices for better water management. Sample Report To write an appropirate report, we are suggesting to use the Sample Report file. Each team should submit their report in “PDF” or “Word Document”. Session 01 Presentation This is the Power Point of the first session.
